CustomField.formula: IF ( AND ( ConfirmationDate__c >= DATE (1868,09,08), ConfirmationDate__c <= DATE (1912,07,29)), "M" & TEXT ( YEAR ( ConfirmationDate__c ) - 1867 ) & "年" & TEXT ( MONTH ( ConfirmationDate__c )) & "月" & TEXT ( DAY ( ConfirmationDate__c )) & "日", IF ( AND ( ConfirmationDate__c >= DATE (1912,07,30), ConfirmationDate__c <= DATE (1926,12,24)), "T" & TEXT ( YEAR ( ConfirmationDate__c ) - 1911) & "年" & TEXT ( MONTH ( ConfirmationDate__c )) & "月" & TEXT ( DAY ( ConfirmationDate__c )) & "日", IF ( AND ( ConfirmationDate__c >= DATE (1926,12,25), ConfirmationDate__c <= DATE (1989,01,07)), "S" & TEXT ( YEAR ( ConfirmationDate__c ) - 1925 ) & "年" & TEXT ( MONTH ( ConfirmationDate__c )) & "月" & TEXT ( DAY ( ConfirmationDate__c )) & "日", IF ( AND ( ConfirmationDate__c >= DATE (1989,01,08), ConfirmationDate__c <= DATE (2019,04,30)), "H" & TEXT ( YEAR ( ConfirmationDate__c ) - 1988 ) & "年" & TEXT ( MONTH ( ConfirmationDate__c )) & "月" & TEXT ( DAY ( ConfirmationDate__c )) & "日", IF ( ConfirmationDate__c >= DATE (2019,05,01), "R" & TEXT ( YEAR ( ConfirmationDate__c) - 2018) & "年" & TEXT ( MONTH ( ConfirmationDate__c )) & "月" & TEXT ( DAY ( ConfirmationDate__c )) & "日", "")))))
CustomField.label: 個人情報の同意確認日（和暦）
